channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Nails Inc
channel.desc: A show of hot seasonal colours, classic manicure favourites and unique nail care solutions from Nails Inc.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Molton Brown
channel.desc: Awaken your senses with fragrance experts Molton Brown, London's bath, body and beauty connoisseurs since 1973. Indulge in exquisitely crafted blends brought to you by Molton Brown, London.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Doll10 Beauty
channel.desc: Get high performance results you want with Doll10: the pioneer in age reversal beauty and a combination of breakthrough technologies, age transforming complexes and real life make-up techniques.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: South Western Silver Mini Series Review
channel.desc: Missed our South Western Silver mini series? You can catch up on all the fabulous jewellery showcased right here.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Tili Beauty
channel.desc: Effortlessly update your daily beauty routine with Tili, from beauty tools and everyday essentials, to expert developed fitness and wellbeing items, we've got you covered. Try it, love it with Tili.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Feel Good Beauty with Estee Lauder
channel.desc: Indulge in Estee Lauder's elegant beauty collection with hydrating skincare and luxurious fragrance. Embrace sunnier days with QVC's summer essentials for feel-good TLC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Percy and Reed Haircare
channel.desc: Percy and Reed brings you new haircare products you always needed but could never find and they only create products which work - bringing British individuality and their own style to your hair.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up
channel.desc: Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Margaret Dabbs London
channel.desc: Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New Season White Stuff
channel.desc: Join us to get a look at the new season collection from the High Street fashion favourite, White Stuff.
